ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Three groups of six 50s is too much, certainly, but it does support three high level groups.  The fact that YOU can solo them non-stop simply suggests to
ygData.messageBody:
Naeeldar wrote:
>
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Again why ? I don't care about exp anymore. FYI if it supposts 3 full groups
> of 50's on your server then they are doing something wrong. I can pull and
> solo 1 sea fury non stop...
>
> Naeeldar

Three groups of six 50s is too much, certainly, but it does support three high
level groups. The fact that YOU can solo them non-stop simply suggests to me
(yet again, for the umpteenth time) that Necros are tremendously unbalanced and
vastly overpowered.

Kenross Cantorforjado, 40 songs, Innoruuk
